channel.title: Fallout: New Vegas E3 Live Demo
channel.description:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nFE47uv3hhM]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nFE47uv3hhM[/url]
This game actually looks amazing. The release date is October 19, 2010. Buy it.
Obsidian has added weapon mods, and some other cool features, and I think the game looks pretty sweet. Not sloppy, compared to the other videos that have been released.
[size=0.7em]SPOILER: you can aim down the sight of your gun asdhdsaukjhdsakjdshakjsdahsdak.[/size]
